alert.note: Alert for Northeast Aroostook; Northern Penobscot; Northwest Aroostook; Southeast Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 08 at 11:56AM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...Scattered Snow Showers And Areas Of Blowing Snow This Afternoon... Scattered snow showers will occur across the region this afternoon. Visibilities could be significantly reduced in heavier snow showers. In addition, northwest winds gusting up to 35 to 40 mph will cause areas of blowing snow which will reduce visibilities and could produce drifting on roads. Roads open to northwest winds will be most impacted with blowing and drifting snow. Motorists should be alert for rapidly changing visibilities with any snow showers and blowing snow along with possible drifting and slippery road conditions. Slow down and maintain a safe distance between other vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Aroostook; Northern Penobscot; Northwest Aroostook; Southeast Aroostook
